title: The heck is up with Vaynes E?
body: I just played her for the probably 4th time ever and her E has a massive lag on the damage. Is this normal?

replies.body: Thats because the damage isnt dealt on hit its dealt when the target stops moving, like when sion hits a minion with e

I main Vayne second too Nasus, and I don't have this problem. There is a slight delay if she condemns the target, but it's not game changing, plus it doesn't actually effect the damage dealt. 

Remember too her E doesn't do much damage at all unless it's either condemned them against a wall or proc'd your third silver bolt.
its always had a delay when the damage shows up
